Params: {3: "Although the Constructs manage to fend off the monster's attack, that is not of much help to bettering the situation..."}
{3: 'The rudimentary attacks from the Constructs do little to the monster.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ann', 3: "Commandant, you're stuck here... It must be the one doing this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "It's a mindless monster, who responded to my wish to keep you here forever... It wants to trap your mind here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'If we destroy it, I can regain control of this domain and release your consciousness from this place.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'But now, just relying on our strength is not enough. Only you can unlock the full potential of the Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'This is our last battle... Please lead them to victory!', 4: '1'}
